description: Monitors Kubernetes deployments in cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory of deployments, replicas in each deployment. Uses Kube state metrics and cAdvisor metrics (741)

targets.expr: (((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))) - ((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)))) / ((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(environment=~"^$env$",kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))) * 100

(1 - ((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",deployment=~"$Deployment"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",statefulset=~"$Statefulset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",daemonset=~"$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))) / ((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",deployment=~"$Deployment"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",statefulset=~"$Statefulset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",daemonset=~"$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))) ) * 100

(sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))

(sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",deployment=~"$Deployment"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_status_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",statefulset=~"$Statefulset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",daemonset=~"$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))

(sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",deployment=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",statefulset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",daemonset=~".*$Deployment$Statefulset$Daemonset"}) or vector(0))

((sum(kube_deployment_status_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",deployment=~"$Deployment"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_statefulset_replicas{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",statefulset=~"$Statefulset"}) or vector(0)) + (sum(kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",daemonset=~"$Daemonset"}) or vector(0)))

sum by(pod_name, namespace) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{environment=~"^$env$",kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"^$namespace$", pod_name=~"^$Pod.*$"}[5m])) / (sum by(pod_name, namespace) (container_spec_cpu_quota{environment=~"^$env$",kubernetes_io_hostname=~"^$Node$",namespace=~"^$namespace$"} / 100000)) * 100

sum by(pod_name, namespace, job) (container_memory_rss{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",image!=""}) / sum by(pod_name, namespace, job) (container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",image!=""}) * 100 != +Inf

sum by(pod_name, namespace, job) (container_memory_rss{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",image!=""}) / sum by(pod_name, namespace, job) (container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",image!=""}) * 100 != +Inf

sum by(pod_name, namespace, job) (container_memory_rss{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",image!=""}) / sum by(pod_name, namespace, job) (container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{environment=~"^$env$",namespace=~"^$namespace$",image!=""}) * 100 != +Inf
